house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1976 has 3 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace, air conditioning.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s), Dining/LivingCombo, Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Garage Door Opener, Microwave
